Name: Sandmade
About the game: Look closely and imagine, do those structures fit together? Sandmade is a beautiful puzzle game that starts simple and relaxing but will soon challenge your brain and test your spatial skills. How good are you at visualising objects in your mind? Immerse yourself in the world of sand shapes and find out. Features: 10 simple levels to learn the rules 90 increasingly challenging puzzles to test yourself Beautiful graphics that make everything look like delightful sand structures Rhythmic music to keep you in the zone No timers, no scores, it's just you and the puzzles Each level's visuals and difficulty are handcrafted, but when you finish you can play again and get a new challenge Achievements Everything is pretty and responsive Mouse only
Meta Title: Sandmade: May 16, 2018, Manic Hyena and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sandmade? Check out the release date (May 16, 2018), developer insights from Manic Hyena, and a complete game summary.
